verses.verse: That the <S%G4246>aged<s%> men be <S%G3524>sober,<s%> <S%G4586>grave,<s%> <S%G4998>temperate,<s%> <S%G5198>sound<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> in <S%G26>charity,<s%> in <S%G5281>patience.<s%>

The <S%G4247>aged<s%> <S%G4247>women<s%> <S%G5615>likewise,<s%> that they be in <S%G2688>behavior<s%> as <S%G2412>becomes<s%> <S%G2412>holiness,<s%> not <S%G1228>false<s%> <S%G1228>accusers,<s%> not <S%G1402>given<s%> to <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G2567>teachers<s%> of <S%G2567>good<s%> things;
That they may <S%G4994>teach<s%> the <S%G3501>young<s%> women to be <S%G4994>sober,<s%> to <S%G5362>love<s%> their <S%G5362>husbands,<s%> to <S%G5388>love<s%> their <S%G5388>children,<s%>

To be <S%G4998>discreet,<s%> <S%G53>chaste,<s%> <S%G3626>keepers<s%> <S%G3626>at<s%> <S%G3626>home,<s%> <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G5293>obedient<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands,<s%> that the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> be not <S%G987>blasphemed.<s%>

In <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3930>showing<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> a <S%G5179>pattern<s%> of <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works:<s%> in <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> showing <S%G90>soundness,<s%> <S%G4587>gravity,<s%> <S%G861>sincerity,<s%>

<S%G5199>Sound<s%> <S%G3056>speech,<s%> that <S%G176>cannot<s%> be <S%G176>condemned;<s%> that he that is of the <S%G1727>contrary<s%> part may be <S%G1788>ashamed,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G5337>evil<s%> thing to <S%G3004>say<s%> of you.

Exhort <S%G1401>servants<s%> to be <S%G5293>obedient<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1203>masters,<s%> and to <S%G2001>please<s%> <S%G1511><s%> them <S%G1510>well<s%> <S%G2101><s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things; not <S%G483>answering<s%> <S%G483>again;<s%>

Not <S%G3557>purloining,<s%> but <S%G1731>showing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4102>fidelity;<s%> that they may <S%G2885>adorn<s%> the <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things.
For the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> that brings <S%G4992>salvation<s%> has <S%G2014>appeared<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%>

<S%G3811>Teaching<s%> us that, <S%G720>denying<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> and <S%G2886>worldly<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%> we should <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G4996>soberly,<s%> <S%G1346>righteously,<s%> and <S%G2153>godly,<s%> in <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G165>world;<s%>

<S%G4327>Looking<s%> for that <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G1680>hope,<s%> and the <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2015>appearing<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and our <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> for us, that he might <S%G3084>redeem<s%> us from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G458>iniquity,<s%> and <S%G2511>purify<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> a <S%G4041>peculiar<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2207>zealous<s%> of <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>

<S%G5023>These<s%> things <S%G2980>speak,<s%> and <S%G3870>exhort,<s%> and <S%G1651>rebuke<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2003>authority.<s%> Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G4065>despise<s%> you.
